name: Zeroperation
description:
Zeroperation is a game where you have to use all numbers and their respective operations in a way that the result at the end is zero, do that and go to the next level!

Features

  • Single Player
  • Runs on anything with a browser (TV, phone, tablet, computer, etc)
  • Supported inputs: touch screen, mouse, keyboard and gamepad/joystick
  • Simple Controls:  4-way directional + 1 button

Controls

  • Keyboard: WASD to move, E to restart/next level
  • Mouse: Scroll to zoom, left click for buttons actions
  • Touch: Drag the ∑ symbol over the numbers
  • Virtual Joystick: Just shows up on touch devices to move

Performance

If you run into performance issues disable the effects at the main menu!
